title: How to get access to PBE?
body: How to get access to PBE? I heard that you want to give players access to PBE. I'm wondering when you can register. I play for a long time in League of Legends, and would very much like to get on the test server.{{sticker:sg-jinx}} If you can let me know the approximate date of the opening of registration for the PBE. Thank you {{sticker:sg-lux}}

replies.body: PBE is down for maintenance, don't have an ETA just now.  Bookmark our [PBE Status page ](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe)to keep up to date in the meantime.
Thank you,{{sticker:sg-kiko}}   and how long will they still closed?{{sticker:sg-soraka}}  And that you will need for registration? {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
